mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_ID , R.WRITE_DATE , R.CONTENT , R.PARENT_REPLY_ID , R.BOARD_ID , M.ID , M.EMAIL , M.NAME , M.NICK_NAME , M.PROFILE_PHOTO , M.MAILING_YN , M.MEMO_RECEIVE_FLAG , LEVEL FROM REPLY R , MEMBER M WHERE R.ID = M.ID AND R.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} START WITH R.PARENT_REPLY_ID = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR R.REPLY_ID = R.PARENT_REPLY_ID
